alert.note: Alert for Harris; Muscogee; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 19 at 3:04AM EDT until March 20 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...For the first Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29. For the second Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 26 expected. * WHERE...Harris, Talbot and Muscogee Counties. * WHEN...For the first Freeze Warning, until 11 AM EDT this morning. For the second Freeze Warning, from 10 PM this evening to 11 AM EDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
